## Summary Statistics

library(reactable)

df <- tibble(
  Variable = c("Air Temperature (&deg;C)", "1m Water Temperature (&deg;C)", "5m Water Temperature (&deg;C)", "1m Salinity (ppt)", "5m Salinity (ppt)"),
  Min. = c("-3.8", "3.4", "3.4", "5.0", "11.5"),
  Mean = c("10.9", "10.3", "9.8", "20.8", "23.7"),
  Max. = c("24.4.", "18.2", "15.5", "34.0", "36.0")
)

reactable(df)
